scripts.postinstall: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); if (!fs.existsSync('.env') && fs.existsSync('.env.example')) { fs.copyFileSync('.env.example', '.env'); console.log('✅ Created .env file from .env.example'); } else if (fs.existsSync('.env')) { console.log('ℹ️  .env file already exists'); } else { console.log('⚠️  .env.example not found'); }"
